Ketu.summary: Ketu–Ketu period deepens spiritual and karmic themes. Detachment, healing, and introspection are strong. Avoid impulsiveness; focus on inner peace and past-life resolution.

Venus.summary: Ketu–Venus blends spirituality with relationships and creativity. Unconventional love or artistic pursuits may surface. Balance material desires with inner growth.

Sun.summary: Ketu–Sun period can bring authority challenges or father-related matters. Spiritual leadership and research may flourish. Health and ego need care.

Moon.summary: Ketu–Moon period affects emotions and mother-related matters. Travel, change of residence, or inner restlessness possible. Practice emotional balance.

Mars.summary: Ketu–Mars can create sudden energy, accidents, or surgical events. Spiritual discipline and courage help. Avoid haste and aggression.

Rahu.summary: Ketu–Rahu (Rahu in Ketu's period) often brings confusion and sudden shifts. Material gains mixed with instability. Stay grounded and avoid shortcuts.

Jupiter.summary: Ketu–Jupiter supports spiritual growth, higher learning, and guru connection. Fortune through detachment and wisdom. Favorable for philosophy and travel.

Saturn.summary: Ketu–Saturn emphasizes karma, service, and delays. Patience and discipline bring long-term gains. Health and older people may need attention.

Mercury.summary: Ketu–Mercury blends intellect with mysticism. Interest in astrology, research, or unconventional studies. Communication may be direct or unusual.

Ketu.summary: Venus–Ketu can bring unconventional relationships or spiritual beauty. Art, music, and healing combine. Some detachment from luxury may help.

Venus.summary: Venus–Venus period strongly favors love, marriage, luxury, and artistic success. Relationships and material comfort flourish. Enjoy but avoid overindulgence.

Sun.summary: Venus–Sun blends charm with authority. Gains through partnerships, government, or senior contacts. Balance ego in relationships.

Moon.summary: Venus–Moon favors emotions, motherhood, and creative expression. Marriage, travel, and domestic happiness supported. Mood and comfort important.

Mars.summary: Venus–Mars brings passion and drive to relationships. Property or partnership gains possible but disputes need care. Channel energy positively.

Rahu.summary: Venus–Rahu can create sudden attraction, foreign partners, or unconventional romance. Material gains mixed with confusion. Stay honest in dealings.

Jupiter.summary: Venus–Jupiter is highly favorable for marriage, children, wealth, and wisdom. Auspicious for expansion and dharma. One of the best combinations.

Saturn.summary: Venus–Saturn may delay marriage or bring older partners. Gains through discipline and patience. Property and long-term stability with effort.

Mercury.summary: Venus–Mercury favors creativity, communication, and business. Relationships and intellectual pursuits flourish. Balance indulgence with focus.

Ketu.summary: Sun–Ketu period may affect father or authority figures. Spiritual leadership and research possible. Health and ego need balance.

Venus.summary: Sun–Venus brings charm and authority together. Gains through partnerships and government. Good for career and marriage.

Sun.summary: Sun–Sun emphasizes leadership, vitality, and self-confidence. Career advancement and respect. Manage ego and father-related matters.

Moon.summary: Sun–Moon blends authority with emotions. Public life, mother, and mood may interplay. Balance confidence with sensitivity.

Mars.summary: Sun–Mars brings courage and leadership. Strong for career, property, or technical work. Avoid aggression and conflicts.

Rahu.summary: Sun–Rahu can create sudden career shifts or authority challenges. Ambition and foreign connections. Ego and confusion need care.

Jupiter.summary: Sun–Jupiter strongly supports wisdom, father, and career. Auspicious for higher education and authority. One of the best periods.

Saturn.summary: Sun–Saturn may bring delays, hard work, or father-related stress. Long-term gains through discipline. Health and authority need patience.

Mercury.summary: Sun–Mercury favors intellect, communication, and business. Career through writing, trade, or accounts. Balance mental stress.

Ketu.summary: Moon–Ketu affects emotions and mother. Travel or change of residence possible. Inner restlessness and spiritual growth.

Venus.summary: Moon–Venus favors emotions, marriage, and creativity. Domestic happiness and artistic pursuits. Good for comfort and partnership.

Sun.summary: Moon–Sun blends emotions with authority. Mother and father dynamics; public life and mood. Balance confidence with sensitivity.

Moon.summary: Moon–Moon emphasizes emotions, mother, travel, and change. Strong for creativity and public appeal. Mood swings need management.

Mars.summary: Moon–Mars brings energy to emotions. Short travels, siblings, or property may be active. Avoid impulsive emotional decisions.

Rahu.summary: Moon–Rahu can create emotional confusion, foreign travel, or unconventional paths. Gains mixed with mood swings. Stay grounded.

Jupiter.summary: Moon–Jupiter favors wisdom, mother, and fortune. Highly auspicious for education, travel, and expansion. Emotional and material growth.

Saturn.summary: Moon–Saturn may bring emotional delays or mother-related concerns. Patience and service help. Long-term emotional stability with effort.

Mercury.summary: Moon–Mercury supports communication, creativity, and business. Emotions and intellect work together. Good for writing and trade.

Ketu.summary: Mars–Ketu can bring sudden energy, accidents, or surgical events. Spiritual discipline and courage help. Avoid haste.

Venus.summary: Mars–Venus brings passion to relationships. Property or partnership gains possible. Channel energy; avoid disputes.

Sun.summary: Mars–Sun favors courage, career, and leadership. Strong for technical work and authority. Avoid aggression.

Moon.summary: Mars–Moon adds energy to emotions. Short travels, siblings, or property active. Manage emotional impulsiveness.

Mars.summary: Mars–Mars emphasizes courage, property, and technical work. High energy; avoid conflicts and accidents. Channel into sports or discipline.

Rahu.summary: Mars–Rahu can create sudden aggression, litigation, or foreign involvement. Property and technical gains possible. Avoid risks.

Jupiter.summary: Mars–Jupiter supports courage with wisdom. Favorable for law, religion, property, and higher education. Balanced growth.

Saturn.summary: Mars–Saturn may bring delays, hard work, or health concerns. Property and technical gains with patience. Avoid litigation.

Mercury.summary: Mars–Mercury favors communication, technical work, and business. Sharp intellect and courage. Good for trade and accounts.

Ketu.summary: Rahu–Ketu brings confusion and sudden shifts. Material gains mixed with instability. Spiritual grounding helps.

Venus.summary: Rahu–Venus can create sudden attraction or unconventional romance. Material gains; stay honest in dealings.

Sun.summary: Rahu–Sun may bring career shifts or authority challenges. Ambition and foreign connections. Manage ego.

Moon.summary: Rahu–Moon can create emotional confusion or foreign travel. Gains mixed with mood swings. Stay grounded.

Mars.summary: Rahu–Mars may bring sudden aggression, litigation, or foreign involvement. Property gains with risk. Avoid haste.

Rahu.summary: Rahu–Rahu period emphasizes ambition, foreign matters, and sudden changes. Technology, politics, or unconventional success. Stay ethical.

Jupiter.summary: Rahu–Jupiter can bring gains through foreign contacts, education, or unconventional wisdom. Expansion with some confusion.

Saturn.summary: Rahu–Saturn often creates delays, karma, and unconventional service. Long-term gains through patience. Avoid shortcuts.

Mercury.summary: Rahu–Mercury favors communication, technology, and unconventional business. Sharp but scattered energy. Focus helps.

Ketu.summary: Jupiter–Ketu supports spiritual growth and higher learning. Fortune through detachment and wisdom. Favorable for philosophy.

Venus.summary: Jupiter–Venus is highly favorable for marriage, wealth, and creativity. One of the best combinations. Expansion and dharma.

Sun.summary: Jupiter–Sun strongly supports wisdom, father, and career. Auspicious for higher education and authority.

Moon.summary: Jupiter–Moon favors wisdom, mother, and fortune. Highly auspicious for education, travel, and emotional growth.

Mars.summary: Jupiter–Mars supports courage with wisdom. Favorable for law, religion, property, and higher education.

Rahu.summary: Jupiter–Rahu can bring gains through foreign contacts or unconventional education. Expansion with some confusion.

Jupiter.summary: Jupiter–Jupiter is highly auspicious. Wisdom, children, fortune, and dharma flourish. One of the best periods.

Saturn.summary: Jupiter–Saturn blends wisdom with discipline. Gains through patience and service. Some delays but long-term growth.

Mercury.summary: Jupiter–Mercury favors education, business, and communication. Intellectual and material expansion. Good for trade and teaching.

Ketu.summary: Saturn–Ketu emphasizes karma, service, and delays. Patience and discipline bring long-term gains. Spiritual discipline helps.

Venus.summary: Saturn–Venus may delay marriage or bring older partners. Gains through discipline. Property and stability with effort.

Sun.summary: Saturn–Sun may bring delays, hard work, or father-related stress. Long-term gains through discipline. Health needs care.

Moon.summary: Saturn–Moon may bring emotional delays or mother-related concerns. Patience and service help. Long-term stability.

Mars.summary: Saturn–Mars may bring delays, hard work, or health concerns. Property gains with patience. Avoid litigation.

Rahu.summary: Saturn–Rahu often creates delays, karma, and unconventional paths. Long-term gains; avoid shortcuts and stay ethical.

Jupiter.summary: Saturn–Jupiter blends wisdom with discipline. Gains through patience and service. Long-term growth with effort.

Saturn.summary: Saturn–Saturn emphasizes hard work, delays, and karma. Patience brings eventual rewards. Health and elders need attention.

Mercury.summary: Saturn–Mercury supports communication and business with discipline. Gains through accounts, trade, or service. Patience required.

Ketu.summary: Mercury–Ketu blends intellect with mysticism. Interest in astrology or research. Unconventional communication.

Venus.summary: Mercury–Venus favors creativity, communication, and business. Relationships and intellectual pursuits flourish.

Sun.summary: Mercury–Sun favors intellect, communication, and career. Business through writing or trade. Balance mental stress.

Moon.summary: Mercury–Moon supports communication, creativity, and emotions. Good for writing, trade, and domestic harmony.

Mars.summary: Mercury–Mars favors communication, technical work, and business. Sharp intellect and courage. Good for trade.

Rahu.summary: Mercury–Rahu favors communication, technology, and unconventional business. Sharp but scattered energy. Focus helps.

Jupiter.summary: Mercury–Jupiter favors education, business, and wisdom. Intellectual and material expansion. Good for teaching.

Saturn.summary: Mercury–Saturn supports communication with discipline. Gains through accounts or service. Patience required.

Mercury.summary: Mercury–Mercury emphasizes intellect, communication, and business. Sharp thinking and trade. Manage restlessness.
